description: This hearty soup recipe with tender chicken thigh pieces and lots of veggies is just the ticket for a cold night. It requires little effort with just three steps – you’ll be back relaxing in the lounge room before you know it!
name: Creamy Chicken & Vegetable Soup Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.3 pkt Woolworths RSPCA approved chicken thigh fillets bulk pack, fat trimmed, cut into 2cm pieces
0.5 pkt Woolworths frozen winter veg mix

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Reserve 1/4 tsp thyme. Add onion, garlic and remaining thyme to pan and cook for 4 minutes or until onion has softened. Add flour and cook for 2 minutes, stirring constantly, or until well combined. Add milk and 1L cold water, then crumble in stock cubes. Stir to combine.
Add vegetables and chicken. Increase heat to high and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to medium and simmer for 10 minutes or until chicken is cooked through.
Ladle into bowls. Sprinkle over reserved thyme and serve seasoned with pepper.
